class.name: CrossoverPolicy

javadoc.text: Policy used to create a pair of new chromosomes by performing a crossover * operation on a source pair of chromosomes.
Perform a crossover operation on the given chromosomes.
javadoc.return: the pair of new chromosomes that resulted from the crossover.
javadoc.throws: MathIllegalArgumentException if the given chromosomes are not compatible with this {@link CrossoverPolicy}
